entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is speaking and explaining something to someone else. She mentions that she has read the content cover to cover and that it mentions her a couple of times a week.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is a person who used to write for them but is not doing so anymore. Hermione says that Rita laid the foundation for what they are trying to do now.

relationships.description: Hermione mentions Rita in her explanation, saying that Rita laid the foundation for what they are trying to do now.
Them (the publication) employed Rita as a writer but she is not writing for them anymore.
